SEARCH
Package org.deepdrimz.drimzsport.notification.sdk.model.enums

Enum Class NotificationType

java.lang.Object
java.lang.Enum<NotificationType>
org.deepdrimz.drimzsport.notification.sdk.model.enums.NotificationType
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable, Comparable<NotificationType>, Constable
public enum NotificationType extends Enum<NotificationType>
Enumeration of supported notification types.

This enum mirrors the notification types defined in the Notification Service domain model. It acts as a strict contract between producers and the notification platform.

Each notification type may declare an EmailAccountCategory which determines the sender identity used for email delivery.

âš  IMPORTANT: Any change to notification types in the notification service MUST be reflected here to maintain type safety and compatibility.

Since:
1.2.0
